Just so you guys know, I made a mistake with my math.  5 tiles
above/below/=
left/right from the center tile amounts to 11 tiles by 11
tiles or 352 by 3=
52 pixels.  The biggest I'm willing to go with is 13
tiles by 13 tiles or 4=
16 by 416 pixels with a box next to it to handle
the radar view.

--- In gl=
adiator@yahoogroups.com, "alternate_dph" <alternate_dph@...>
wrote:
>
> One=
 question that I want to ask: what do you guys consider the
> smallest view=
ing screen you need to see to play gladiator?
> 
> I was thinking if your c=
haracter was in the center, minimally you
> would need to see about 10 tile=
s above you, 10 tiles below you, 10
> tiles to your left, and 10 tiles to y=
our right.  The reason I ask this
> is obviously you can't use full screen =
for a java applet - You have to
> run it inside a web browser.
